attributes.additional_details:
Ban the Police from using Tasers and Guns otherwise allow the public to bear arms also and tasers as well.
The Police should not be above the Law.
We have lived without them throughout the 'Troubles' and we can live without them now. We do not feel safer seeing Cops with guns nor tasers.
There is No Death penalty in this Country and we are not at War ! No one should be allowed to kill unless we are at War. It is not a defence to say that terrorism is an excuse because terrorism is the failure of Government Policy and Laws..
